Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1977...
Injured on 4/21/1977 with a Swollen Ear, out for one week...
Injured on 8/20/1978 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 6/3/1980 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/2/1981...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Signed as a free agent by Lynchburg on 2/1/1986 to a 5-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/25/1989 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
